statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND location = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE id = 1 AND sensor_type = 'temperature';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM camera_data WHERE motion_detected = TRUE;
DELETE FROM motion_detector_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM camera_data WHERE camera_location = 'Living Room' OR motion_detected = true;
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 100 AND reading < 10;
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE data_type = 'temperature' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
